 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎טְוָת‎</span> **adverb** ==fastingly, hungrily== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>1465</sup>; on etymology compare [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Hom. Wurz. 32 f.</sup>; on adverb force of f. term. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תָ֯‎</span>, see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>§ 155 A, M 201</sup> [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>CG 135</sup>; and compare <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רַבַּת‎</span> [[Ps.124.3|Ps 124:3]]); — [[Dan.6.18|Dan 6:18]].
